actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend title IV of the Civil Rights Act of 1964 to prohibit federally ordered assignment of teachers or students on racial and other similar grounds.

summary.text: Amends the Civil Rights Act of 1964 to prohibit any court of the United States or any Federal official from compelling the school assignment of teachers or students on the basis of race, religion, sex, or national origin. Prohibits Federal educational funds from being made conditional upon such assignments.

titles.title: A bill to amend title IV of the Civil Rights Act of 1964 to prohibit federally ordered assignment of teachers or students on racial and other similar grounds.
